com.clover.sdk.util

Class CloverAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clover.sdk.util.CloverAccount

  • public class CloverAccount
extends Object
    This class provides access to the Clover Account object on the device.
    See Also:
    Account, AccountManager

    • Method Detail

      • getAccount

        public static Account getAccount(Context context)
        Get the Clover account on the device. If there are multiple Clover accounts, only the first is returned.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        Returns:
        the first Clover account on the device.

      • getAccounts

        public static Account[] getAccounts(Context context)
        Get all Clover accounts on the device.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
